summary: PURCHASED A 2010 COLEMAN TRAVEL TRAILER, TANDEM AXLE.  WHEN WE TOOK IT OUT THE 1ST TIME THE TIRE BLEW OUT ON THE INSIDE SIDEWALL, WHILE PUTTING ON THE SPARE TIRE WE NOTICED THE 2ND TIRE HAD TIRE WEAR ON THE INSIDE SIDE WALL TO.  WE TOOK A CHANCE AND DROVE 50 MILES TO OUR HOME WHEN WE GOT HOME WE LOOKED AT THE TIRES AGAIN AND NOTICED THE SPARE HAD TIRE WEAR TOO. TOOK TO CAMPING WORLD AND THEY STATED THE AXEL'S WERE TO SHORT.  WE TOLD OUR FRIENDS ABOUT THE PROBLEM SINCE THEY TO HAVE THE SAME TYPE/MODEL AS OURS, THEY TO HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM.   OUR TRAILERS ARE UNDER WARRANTY BUT FEEL THE PUBLIC NEEDS TO KNOW THIS INFORMATION.  VERY SERIOUS/DANGEROUS SITUATION COLEMAN/DUTCHMAN PUT US IN.  POOR WORKMANSHIP/QUALITY CONTROL, NOW WE HAVE TO POSTPONE OUR VACATION BECAUSE CAMPING WORLD IS HAVING PROBLEMS W/MFG TO HAVE AXEL'S EXPEDITED.  NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER.  ESPECIALLY AFTER SPENDING OVER $20,000 AND ONLY HAD IT 3 WEEKS WHEN THIS PROBLEM HAPPENED. *TR
